message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  How about $90?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can see that you're a serious buyer, so I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $110.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $110 is still a bit too high for me. Let's split the difference and go with $105. What do you say?
I'm glad we're close, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I can do a bit better than $105, how about $108?
Alice, we're almost there! I'm really interested in your product, but I can only go up to $102.  If you're willing to accept that, we have a deal.
I can see you're really trying to get a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $106, but that's as low as I can go.
